variables.CELEBRATION: Well done, wizard! Your magical abilities grow stronger with each spell mastered!
variables.OPENING_FLAVOR: Your wand is ready, and the magical world awaits your command!
variables.CLOSING_FLAVOR: You've mastered these enchantments! The wizarding world is safer for your achievements.
variables.CONTEXT_INTRO: Welcome to {{school}}! Your magical education continues with today's lesson.
variables.CONTEXT_PROJECT_INTRO: Time for class, young wizard! Today you'll learn essential spellcasting techniques.
variables.CONTEXT_PREDICTION_INTRO: Skilled witches and wizards predict spell effects before casting. Study the code and foresee the outcome.
variables.CONTEXT_FILL_BLANKS_INTRO: Every wizard must know their fundamentals. Complete these magical exercises to prove your skills.
variables.CONTEXT_SPOT_DIFFERENCE_INTRO: Attention to detail prevents magical mishaps! Compare these spell versions and spot what's different.
variables.CONTEXT_CODE_ORDERING_INTRO: Spells must be cast in the proper sequence. Arrange these incantations in the correct order.
variables.CONTEXT_MATCH_OUTPUT_INTRO: Connect each spell to its magical effect. A wizard must know exactly what their incantations will produce.
variables.CONTEXT_DECODE_ERROR_INTRO: Alert! Spell malfunctions detected! Analyze these error messages and understand what went wrong.
variables.CONTEXT_COMPLETE_FUNCTION_INTRO: {{mentor}} has started crafting new spells. Complete the enchantments to finish the work.
variables.CONTEXT_INVESTIGATION_INTRO: Emergency at {{school}}! Several enchantments have been sabotaged!
variables.CONTEXT_FIX_STYLE_INTRO: Even working spells can be improved. A true wizard writes clean, elegant incantations.
variables.CONTEXT_DISCOVERY_INTRO: Welcome, first-year! Today you begin your magical education at {{school}}.
variables.CONTEXT_LEARNING_OBJECTIVE: Master these fundamental magical techniques to advance in your wizarding studies.
variables.CONTEXT_PREDICTION_PURPOSE: This skill helps you anticipate magical effects before casting - essential for any witch or wizard!
variables.CONTEXT_EXAMPLE_NARRATIVE: Watch how {{mentor}} demonstrates proper wand technique:
variables.CONTEXT_INCREMENTAL_NARRATIVE: Like all great witches and wizards, you'll build your powers spell by spell.
variables.CONTEXT_CODE_SAMPLE_NARRATIVE: A first-year student submitted this spell. It works, but can you spot what needs improvement?
variables.CONTEXT_STUDENT_TASK: Now it's your turn, young wizard. Apply what you've learned!
variables.CONTEXT_INVESTIGATION_MISSION: As a member of the Spell Debugging Squad, you must identify each malfunction and restore the enchantments.
variables.CONTEXT_SUCCESS_CRITERIA: Your spell should produce exactly the expected magical effect.
variables.CONTEXT_IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDANCE: Start with the basic incantation, then add complexity step by step.
variables.CONTEXT_FINAL_ASSEMBLY: Spell complete! Cast your incantation to see the magic come to life!
variables.CONTEXT_VERIFICATION_COMPLETE: Verification complete! Check how your predictions matched the actual spell effects.
variables.CONTEXT_ROLE_COMPLETE: Excellent work, wizard! You've proven your magical abilities in this lesson.
variables.CONTEXT_INVESTIGATION_COMPLETE: All enchantments restored! The castle is safe once more thanks to your debugging skills.
variables.CONTEXT_IMPROVEMENT_COMPLETE: Splendid! Your refined spell is now worthy of the Grand Grimoire.
variables.CONTEXT_TRIUMPH_COMPLETE: Congratulations, wizard! You've completed this magical challenge and grown more powerful!
variables.CONTEXT_SETBACK_INTRO: {{hero}} faced a devastating defeat. A spell backfired, and the consequences were severe. But every great wizard learns from failure.
variables.CONTEXT_SETBACK_NARRATIVE: Study what went wrong in the previous duel. Identify the bugs in {{hero}}'s code that allowed {{villain}} to win.
variables.CONTEXT_CONFRONTATION_INTRO: The moment has arrived. {{hero}} faces {{villain}} in the ultimate magical showdown!
variables.CONTEXT_CONFRONTATION_NARRATIVE: Every spell you've practiced, every lesson you've learned, has led to this moment. Cast wisely!
variables.CONTEXT_PHASE_1: Every wizard starts here. Master this fundamental charm before moving on.
variables.CONTEXT_PHASE_2: Good progress! Now let's expand your magical repertoire.
variables.CONTEXT_PHASE_3: Your powers are growing! Time for more challenging enchantments.
variables.CONTEXT_PHASE_4: Final challenge! Combine everything you've learned into one grand spell.
variables.CONTEXT_PREDICTION_GUIDANCE_1: Read the incantation carefully. What magical effect will appear?
variables.CONTEXT_CHALLENGE_2_NARRATIVE: This enchantment demonstrates an important technique. Predict the outcome.
variables.CONTEXT_PREDICTION_GUIDANCE_2: Pay attention to how magical values are combined.
variables.CONTEXT_CHALLENGE_3_NARRATIVE: Wizards must see beyond the obvious. What will this spell produce?
variables.CONTEXT_PREDICTION_GUIDANCE_3: Watch for the difference between variable names and magical strings.
variables.CONTEXT_CHALLENGE_4_NARRATIVE: Calculate the magical result in your head before casting.
variables.CONTEXT_CHALLENGE_5_NARRATIVE: The final test! Predict this calculation correctly.
variables.CONTEXT_PREDICTION_GUIDANCE_5: Think about which operations happen first in the enchantment.
variables.CONTEXT_EXERCISE_1_NARRATIVE: Start with the basics. Every wizard needs this fundamental skill.
variables.CONTEXT_EXERCISE_2_NARRATIVE: Build on what you learned. This gets a bit more challenging.
variables.CONTEXT_EXERCISE_3_NARRATIVE: Practice makes perfect. Apply your growing magical skills here.
variables.CONTEXT_EXERCISE_4_NARRATIVE: Combine multiple techniques in this final challenge.
variables.CONTEXT_COMPARISON_1_NARRATIVE: One spell works, one backfires. Can you spot why?
variables.CONTEXT_COMPARISON_2_NARRATIVE: Both spells cast without errors, but they produce different magical effects. Why?
variables.CONTEXT_COMPARISON_3_NARRATIVE: A subtle difference causes a magical mishap. Find it!
variables.CONTEXT_ORDERING_1_NARRATIVE: Arrange these incantations so the spell works correctly.
variables.CONTEXT_ORDERING_2_NARRATIVE: Put the magical operations in the right order.
variables.CONTEXT_ORDERING_3_NARRATIVE: Make the magical output tell a coherent tale.
variables.CONTEXT_ORDERING_4_NARRATIVE: Each enchantment depends on the previous one. Get the order right!
variables.CONTEXT_MATCH_SET_1_NARRATIVE: Connect each incantation to its magical effect.
variables.CONTEXT_MATCH_SET_2_NARRATIVE: These spells mix strings and numbers. Match carefully!
variables.CONTEXT_ERROR_1_NARRATIVE: This spell backfired! Analyze the error message to understand why.
variables.CONTEXT_ERROR_2_NARRATIVE: The spell couldn't even be cast. What went wrong with the incantation?
variables.CONTEXT_ERROR_3_NARRATIVE: An invalid magical operation caused this misfire. Identify and fix it.
variables.CONTEXT_FUNCTION_1_NARRATIVE: Complete this spell to create a proper wizarding greeting.
variables.CONTEXT_FUNCTION_2_NARRATIVE: Build a spell that displays a wizard's magical statistics.
variables.CONTEXT_FUNCTION_3_NARRATIVE: Create a spell that performs magical calculations and formats the result.
variables.CONTEXT_CASE_1_NARRATIVE: A potion calculation is producing wrong results!
variables.CONTEXT_INVESTIGATION_PROMPT_1: Look at the ingredient types. Is something stored incorrectly?
variables.CONTEXT_CASE_2_NARRATIVE: The magical display shows the wrong information!
variables.CONTEXT_INVESTIGATION_PROMPT_2: Check what's inside the quotes. Is a variable being printed correctly?
variables.CONTEXT_CASE_3_NARRATIVE: Calculations look correct, but the magical output is wrong!
variables.CONTEXT_INVESTIGATION_PROMPT_3: Trace which variable is actually being displayed.
variables.CONTEXT_CASE_4_NARRATIVE: The message spell is backfiring with a type error!
variables.CONTEXT_INVESTIGATION_PROMPT_4: Can you combine strings and numbers directly with the joining operator?
variables.CONTEXT_STYLE_1_NARRATIVE: This spell works but uses terrible variable names.
variables.CONTEXT_STYLE_FIX_1: Rename the variables to be clear and descriptive.
variables.CONTEXT_STYLE_2_NARRATIVE: This spell is cramped and hard to read.
variables.CONTEXT_STYLE_FIX_2: Add proper spacing around magical operators.
variables.CONTEXT_STYLE_3_NARRATIVE: This spell needs a complete style overhaul.
variables.CONTEXT_STYLE_FIX_3: Apply all improvements: names, spacing, and modern incantation formatting.
variables.CONTEXT_DISCOVERY_NARRATIVE: Study how experienced witches and wizards use these techniques. Predict the magical effects before casting.
variables.CONTEXT_GUIDANCE_INTRO: Now practice with guidance. We'll help you through each step of the incantation.
variables.CONTEXT_GUIDANCE_NARRATIVE: Complete these guided exercises. The spell structure is provided - you fill in the magical details.
variables.CONTEXT_GROWTH_INTRO: Time to cast on your own! Create your own spell using what you've learned.
variables.CONTEXT_GROWTH_NARRATIVE: No more hand-holding. Show us your magical abilities, young wizard!
